text: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَٰهَا مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

translation.en: So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; We destined her to be of those who remained behind
translation.id: Maka Kami selamatkan dia dan keluarganya, kecuali istrinya. Kami telah menentukan dia termasuk orang-orang yang tertinggal (dibinasakan)
